abstract: A Newsweek article contends that a man in Southern California named Satoshi Nakamoto was the creator of the virtual currency Bitcoin, but many people say they are unconvinced.
snippet: A Newsweek article contends that a man in Southern California named Satoshi Nakamoto was the creator of the virtual currency Bitcoin, but many people say they are unconvinced.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 1:31 p.m. | Even as it has grown into a new type of digital money worth billions of dollars, Bitcoin has always retained an air of mystery.

headline.main: Bitcoin’s Mysterious Creator Is Said to Be Identified
headline.print_headline: Bitcoin’s Mysterious Creator Is Said to Be Found

byline.original: By Nathaniel Popper and Rachel Abrams
